functionDecorators.name: getSellOneTokenForAnotherRate
functionDecorators.description: If you sell one (1) token, how much of another do you get?.

parameterDecorators.name: _sold_token_contract
parameterDecorators.description: Contract of the token we simulate sell.

parameterDecorators.name: _received_token_contract
parameterDecorators.description: Contract of the token we simulate receive.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of token we expect in return for a single sold token.
